DESCRIPTION:
Generates a "Drop" of cards
Use the command "{{prefix}}dn" to generate a "Drop" without images
EXTRA_DROP_ALERT: {{author}} Your **Extra Drop** is being used. You have**{{remaining}}** remaining
BUY_DROP:
You can also `Vote` to receive `Wists` and buy `Drops` with them!
Use the command `{{prefix}}buy drop <Amount>` to buy `Drops`
